defaults rule or Command for Yes reply: defaults write com.apple.driver.AppleBluetoothMultitouch.trackpad Clicking -bool true && defaults -currentHost write NSGlobalDomain com.apple.mouse.tapBehavior -int 1 && defaults write NSGlobalDomain com.apple.mouse.tapBehavior -int 1
